publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3324 Jackie Baillie: Report of the Working Group on Debt Relief—That the Parliament welcomes the report of the Working Group on Debt Relief, established by the Scottish Executive; commends those involved, representing both creditor and debtor interests, for arriving at a series of positive recommendations to address the debt problems experienced by people with no income and no assets; notes the recommendation to provide a single gateway procedure for those without access to other forms of debt relief; considers that this will ensure that no person without income or assets will fall through the net, and therefore encourages the Executive to include the proposal in the forthcoming legislation to reform bankruptcy and diligence.

S2M-3324 Report of the Working Group on Debt Relief (lodged on 20 September 2005) Sarah Boyack*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Alex Neil*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Cathy Peattie*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Marlyn Glen*, Trish Godman*, Paul Martin*, Bill Butler*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*

S2M-3324 Jackie Baillie: Report of the Working Group on Debt Relief—That the Parliament welcomes the report of the Working Group on Debt Relief, established by the Scottish Executive; commends those involved, representing both creditor and debtor interests, for arriving at a series of positive recommendations to address the debt problems experienced by people with no income and no assets; notes the recommendation to provide a single gateway procedure for those without access to other forms of debt relief; considers that this will ensure that no person without income or assets will fall through the net, and therefore encourages the Executive to include the proposal in the forthcoming legislation to reform bankruptcy and diligence. Supported by: Sarah Boyack, Ms Wendy Alexander, Alex Neil, Mr Jamie Stone, Cathy Peattie, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Marlyn Glen, Trish Godman, Paul Martin, Bill Butler, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Mike Pringle*, Karen Whitefield*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-3324 Report of the Working Group on Debt Relief (lodged on 20 September 2005) Irene Oldfather*, Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-3324 Report of the Working Group on Debt Relief (lodged on 20 September 2005) Donald Gorrie*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3324 Report of the Working Group on Debt Relief (lodged on 20 September 2005) Shiona Baird*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-3324 Report of the Working Group on Debt Relief (lodged on 20 September 2005) Dr Jean Turner*, John Swinburne*, Susan Deacon*
S2M-3324 Report of the Working Group on Debt Relief (lodged on 20 September 2005) Scott Barrie*
S2M-3324 Report of the Working Group on Debt Relief (lodged on 20 September 2005) Robin Harper*
S2M-3324 Report of the Working Group on Debt Relief (lodged on 20 September 2005) Eleanor Scott*
S2M-3324 Report of the Working Group on Debt Relief (lodged on 20 September 2005) Karen Gillon*
S2M-3324 Report of the Working Group on Debt Relief (lodged on 20 September 2005) Elaine Smith*
